short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Control the speed of media playback

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Take control of your online viewing and listening experience with the Media Speed Controller extension. This tool lets you adjust the playback speed of audio and video** content directly from your browser.

Whether you're trying to speed through a lengthy podcast, slow down a complex tutorial, or fine-tune the pace of a film, Media Speed Controller puts the power in your hands.

**Note that not all Videos are supported, depand on the website streaming method
